systemInstruction.title: Your Instruction to the Bot on a system level
systemInstruction.description: Perplexity allows you to preprogram the model with instructions at the system level, ensuring that you receive the results formatted as needed.

model.title: Bot Model
model.description: Select model you would like to use

max_tokens.title: Tokens
max_tokens.description: Select the maximum number of tokens the platform should use. In text models like Perplexity, one token equals one word.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: The amount of randomness in the response, valued between 0 inclusive and 2 exclusive. Higher values are more random, and lower values are more deterministic.

apiKey.title: Your Persplexity API
apiKey.description: Your API key to use with PRO model

cleanText.title: Clean Answer
cleanText.description: elements will be replaced for whitespaces
